t: Walmart sells ModCloth just two years after buying it | The Verge
s: October 5, 2019 - For Walmart, the deal was part of a larger strategy to ramp up its e-commerce business in an effort to compete with Amazon. “When we acquired ModCloth, our primary focus was to build assortment through proprietary, digitally-native brands,” a Walmart spokesperson told The Verge.
